name: Bonus; waiver by veteran
text: Any veteran who may qualify for a nonservice-connected pension through the Department of Veterans Affairs may waive any portion or all of the benefits that the veteran may receive under sections 88-11 to 88-16. [L 1961, c 175, pt of §12; Supp, §6-254; HRS ; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 2017, c 12, §1]
